attributes.action: Internet trolling and cyberbullying should be made a criminal offence.
attributes.additional_details: The current laws are not enforced or strong enough, bigger sentences and fines are needed for those convicted.
attributes.background:
Internet trolling a quarter of teenagers suffered online abuse last year adults and celebrities also face the same daily and suicide is a risk.

Survey of 13- to 18-year-olds reveals teenagers with disabilities and those from minority ethnic backgrounds are more likely to encounter cyberbullying
